info.author: Arun Sharma aruns2
info.abstract: The descriptioncomponent generates one-click decription of students' distribution. By importing a CSV file that contains information about students' school, grade, gender and race description component is an example of a(n) R component.
info.description: Component generates four graphs portraying the number of students for each school,grade, gender and race, normally datasets also have discipline
info.inputs: A csv file that contains columns pertaining to student ID (Could be labled "studentid" or "pl2.id"), SchoolName, Grade, Gender and Race or Ethnicity, discipline

outputs.b: image1: Describes the number of students in each school
